attributes.action: Reqeust the Catholic Church donate the£1,000,000,000,000 to Protect The Planet
attributes.background:
The Catholic church being one of the richest organisations ever!
I think they and the insurance companies can pay for the re building, giving back to the world and using its own resource would be the right thing to do.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the Catholic church, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
